description: Our Original casual short that redefined the meaning of proper length shorts.These bad boys are kind of a big deal: they're made from our fanciest, most-technologically-advanced stretch casual fabric for the ultimate in movability and flexibility. They even feature an elastic waistband and an updated (read: improved, more comfortable) fit. Nothing will make your thighs look as good as these. Machine Wash Cold With Like Colors, Tumble Dry Low Best For:Weekend Wear, Tailgating, Happy Hour, Sunny Days

These durable, spill-proof, do-it-all shorts are the epitome of versatility. Available with or without a soft boxer brief liner, they were built to go everywhere and do anything. Take them out on a round of 18, a cross country flight, or even a nice romantic dinner for two. The possibilities are endless.

The Freestyle Shorts are as easygoing as they are stylish. Pairing perfectly with just about anything from a pullover to a polo, they're ideal for times when you need to get out of the house without thinking too hard. With a looser, more relaxed fit around the leg and an ultra-soft mesh interior, these shorts offer enough comfort and breeziness to handle whatever comes your way.Best For:Everyday Wear, Low-Intensity Activities

Meet the Ultimate Training Shorts, where high performance and comfort meets your personality. With split side seams and an anti-chafe liner, every detail was designed and tested for effortless movement. Added with a dual-layered drawstring waistband and dedicated liner phone pockets, you can rest easy knowing that all of your goods will stay secure. Best For:Weightlifting, Running, HIIT, Cycling

The Ultimate Training Short that caters to your unique needs. Sporting split side hems, an unlined interior, and hidden zipper back pocket, these shorts have what you need for maximum mobility during your workouts. We call it the Comfort Short because that's exactly what it is, ridiculously comfortable. Designed with a washed look to create a unique hue to each piece, these are the shorts to wear when you're thinking "I want to put on my nice sweats today". With a vintage, lived-in feel, they drape over your legs with a loose, relaxed fit. Their versatility makes them ideal for chilling at home or spending a day out and about. Every time you slide on these Comfort Shorts, your legs will thank you — trust us.

Designed to put the leisure in athleisure, the Movementum collection is your new go-to for dog walking, errand running, TV bingeing, and more. These buttery soft shorts feature our exclusive ultra lightweight 4-way stretch Movementum fabric that will keep you cool and cozy all weekend long. With contrast detailing, a zipper back pocket, and an elevated fit, you’ll wonder how you ever lived a day without them.Make it a set with a matching hoodie or quarter-zip to unlock next level comfort > Machine Wash Cold, Tumble Dry Low You've gotta feel it to believe it. Love it or return it in 90 days for free.

Crafted from breathable mesh fabric, these shorts are designed with a dual-layered drawstring waistband and two liner phone pockets for secure storage. They already look like you, why not dress them like you too?These kids swim trunks are the same weekend-enhancing swimmers as our adult trunk, just mini me size. Made from a quick drying, ultra stretchy material, these will keep you and the kids looking cool and feeling comfortable all day long. Machine Wash Cold, Tumble Dry Low

For those playful days spent in the sun with your little ones, our rash guard sports a mildew-resistant and moisture-wicking fabric, UPF 50+ sun protection, and a specialty design for flexibility and ease of movement. Equal parts comfortable, functional and just flat-out adorable, it's perfect for a day at the pool or a day at the playground. Whether you're wearing 'em with trunks or matching 'em to the big ones, the rash guard will quickly become a weekend favorite.

We call ’em the Everywear pants because they’re designed to be worn everywhere. With added room and stretch right where it counts, and a lightweight, wrinkle-resistant, and water-resistant fabric to top it all off.  They’re the perfect go-to short for everything from days in the office to weekend adventures. Keeping you cool and comfortable through even the warmest temps. Dress them up, dress them down – no matter where you go, the Everywear Pants will always bring that feel-good vibe. Machine Wash Cold, Tumble Dry Low Best For:Golfing, Workwear, Traveling, Everyday Wearing

The Polo that puts the “performance” in Performance Polo. Equipped with a tailored fit and structured collar that will elevate every look. The fabric is super lightweight and moisture wicking to keep you cool as you navigate your day, whether that be in the office, on the course, or at happy hour. Not only is this fabric super breathable and UPF 50+, it’s also incredibly stretchy to move with you, wherever your day takes you. Best For:Casual Friday, Backyard Barbecues, Golf

The golf course just got a glow-up. Say hello to the Range Polo, carefully crafted with a soft, breathable ultra fine performance knit fabric for maximum comfort on the course. Sporting a drier, organic fabric blend that's light and airy, for a feel that's fresher than the green's morning dew. Best For: Golf, Casual Wear

A shirt sure to add a level of sophistication to your look, even if you're just fakin' it. Sporting an updated, classic fit with a full button front and buttoned collar, the Resort Weave Friday Shirt represents the pinnacle of weekend wear. It's all bound together with a light and airy woven texture built for comfort, maximum breathability, and all-day wearability. Pair with your favorite shorts and brace yourself for compliments.

Say hello to the Oversized Tee. A relaxed, roomy fit around the shoulders and body make these tees easy to pair with just about anything. This is that "no time to think through my outfit this morning, gotta toss something on and still have it look good" kind of tee. This tee is colored with a process that results in a unique wash for each and every piece — so it's not a lie to say that each and every tee is literally one of a kind. Oh, and these graphics are ​limited​, meaning once these sell out, they won't be restocked.
WARNING: May result in excessive head nods, fist bumps, and "hey, nice shirt" from strangers.

Take a wild guess why we call this the Comfort Hoodie. We'll make it easy for you: because it's ridiculously comfortable. With an oversized fit & unique washed out look, the Comfort Hoodie has a soft, worn-in feel from the start with a unique hue to each piece. This super-versatile hoodie can be worn when taking your dog on a walk in the spring, layering up in the winter, raking leaves in the fall, or staying cozy indoors with the AC blasting in the summertime.

Take a wild guess why we call this the Comfort Crewneck. We'll make it easy for you: because it's ridiculously comfortable. With an oversized fit & unique washed out look, the Comfort Crewneck has a soft, worn-in feel from the start with a unique hue to each piece. This super-versatile hoodie can be worn when taking your dog on a walk in the spring, layering up in the winter, raking leaves in the fall, or staying cozy indoors with the AC blasting in the summertime

Take on sun-scorching days on the water with ease.This lightweight performance crewneck is decked out with details. Constructed with a moisture-wicking, anti-microbial fabric and a loose active fit, this do-it-all top moves in all directions for any adventure you take it on. From days on the lake to deep sea fishing, we’ve maximized sun coverage and breathability to keep you feeling comfortable from sun up to sun down. Best For:Surfing, Fishing, Paddle Boarding

A polo so extremely stretchy and breathable, you’ll wonder how you ever performed without it.Not only does it give you a fresh look that’s perfect for hitting the course or crushing a video call, but it’s also super functional. Made from a lightweight, performance-enhancing fabric that’s anti-bacterial, moisture wicking, UPF 50+ (we’re not done), anti-static, AND ultra stretchy. Mix that with a loose fit that can be tucked in or left out, you’ll be cool and comfortable through whatever life throws your way. Machine Wash Cold, Tumble Dry Low

Take on sun-scorching days on the water with ease.This lightweight performance crewneck is decked out with details. From days on the lake to deep sea fishing, we’ve maximized sun coverage and breathability to keep you feeling comfortable from sun up to sun down. Best For:Surfing, Fishing, Paddle Boarding

Not only do these tees match well to our swim trunks & shorts, they're the kind of stylish that will make everyone go "wait a minute, where did you get that?" And then they'll see "Chubbies" across the front and go "ah yes, of course. Chubbies." Comfy, stylish, versatile—you get the picture. These are the perfect tees for both a day at school and all the adventures that follow once that final bell rings.
